channel.title: NpcHandler Help plz plz plz

item.title: NpcHandler Help plz plz plz
item.dc:creator: @Zaikill Zaikill
item.description:
@Zaikill wrote:

this is the code i try put :

if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 1655) { //crawling hand
int Player = npcs[NPCID].StartKilling;
client ppl = (client) server.playerHandler.players[Player];
try{
ppl.addSkillXP(2000, 18);
ItemHandler.addItem(Item2.randomCrawling_Hand(), npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false);
} catch(Exception E) {
ppl.addSkillXP(2000, 18);
ItemHandler.addItem(Item2.randomCrawling_Hand(), npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false);
}
}
if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 1614) { //death spawn
int Player = npcs[NPCID].StartKilling;
client ppl = (client) server.playerHandler.players[Player];
try{
ppl.addSkillXP(4500, 18);
ItemHandler.addItem(Item2.randomDeath_Spawn(), npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false);
} catch(Exception E) {
ppl.addSkillXP(4500, 18);
ItemHandler.addItem(Item2.randomDeath_Spawn(), npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false);
}
}
if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 1625) { //Dust devil
int Player = npcs[NPCID].StartKilling;
client ppl = (client) server.playerHandler.players[Player];

ItemHandler.addItem(Item2.randomSmoke_Devil(), npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false);

ppl.addSkillXP(9500, 18);
ItemHandler.addItem(Item2.randomSmoke_Devil(), npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false);

try{

try{
ppl.addSkillXP(7000, 18);

item.description:
